suncertify.server

Interface DBAccessRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataRemote

    public interface DBAccessRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface is identical to the DBAccess interface except all the methods also throw RemoteException.
    Author:
    Robbie Byrne

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean alreadyBooked(long recNo)
      This method checks if a record is already booked.
      long createRecord(java.lang.String[] data)
      This method creates a new record in the DBCache.
      void deleteRecord(long recNo, long cookie)
      This method deletes a record from the DBCache
      long[] findByCriteria(java.lang.String[] criteria)
      This method returns an int array corresponding to records which match the search criteria based on name and location.
      java.util.List<HotelRoom> getAllRecords()
      This method returns all the HotelRoom records from the DBCache.
      java.lang.String[] getFields()
      This methods returns all the field names of a HotelRoom record.
      boolean isLocked(long recNo)
      This method determines if a record is currently locked.
      long lockRecord(long recNo)
      This method locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client.
      java.lang.String[] readRecord(long recNo)
      This method reads a record from the DBCache.
      void unlock(long recNo, long cookie)
      This method releases the lock on a record.
      void updateRecord(long recNo, java.lang.String[] data, long cookie)
      This method modifies the fields of a record.

    • Method Detail

      • readRecord

        java.lang.String[] readRecord(long recNo)
                              throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method reads a record from the DBCache.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record
        Returns:
        Returns an array where each element is a record value.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • updateRecord

        void updateRecord(long recNo,
                java.lang.String[] data,
                long cookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         SecurityException
        This method modifies the fields of a record. The new value for field n appears in data[n].
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record
        data - String array containing field values of a record.
        cookie - The cookie used to lock and unlock the record in the database.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.
        SecurityException

      • deleteRecord

        void deleteRecord(long recNo,
                long cookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method deletes a record from the DBCache
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • findByCriteria

        long[] findByCriteria(java.lang.String[] criteria)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method returns an int array corresponding to records which match the search criteria based on name and location.
        Parameters:
        criteria - String array containing search criteria.
        Returns:
        int array of record numbers.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • createRecord

        long createRecord(java.lang.String[] data)
                  throws DuplicateKeyException,
                         java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method creates a new record in the DBCache.
        Parameters:
        data - String array containing field values of a record.
        Returns:
        Record number of new record.
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException - Never thrown in this application.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • lockRecord

        long lockRecord(long recNo)
                throws RecordNotFoundException,
                       java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • unlock

        void unlock(long recNo,
          long cookie)
            throws SecurityException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method releases the lock on a record.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record.
        cookie - The cookie used to unlock the locked record.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.
        SecurityException - Thrown if the cookie used to unlock the record does not match the cookie used to lock the record.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(long recNo)
                 throws RecordNotFoundException,
                        java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method determines if a record is currently locked.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record.
        Returns:
        True if the record is locked, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • getAllRecords

        java.util.List<HotelRoom> getAllRecords()
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method returns all the HotelRoom records from the DBCache.
        Returns:
        List of HotelRoom records.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getFields

        java.lang.String[] getFields()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This methods returns all the field names of a HotelRoom record.
        Returns:
        String array of field names.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.

      • alreadyBooked

        boolean alreadyBooked(long recNo)
                      throws RecordNotFoundException,
                             java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method checks if a record is already booked.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Number of record.
        Returns:
        True if the record is booked, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number could not be found.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a client-server network issue.
